comments.body: Wow this API is weird.. had to go look it up to understand why this is structured this way

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@    unsafeRun(
      for {
        subSeqF       <- UIO(Source.asSubscriber[Int].toMat(Sink.seq)(Keep.both).run())
        (sub, seqF)   = subSeqF
        errorSink     <- sub.toSink[Throwable]
